name: S1: Ep8/9 "Belding's Baby" & "Good-Bye Megan" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions
tags: Saved By The Bell: The New Class

questions.text: Ep. 8: Where was Weasel hiding at the start of the episode?
questions.explanation:
In the trash can.

	Weasel was hiding in the trash can at the bottom of the stairs in the main hall.  He told Scott that Mr. Belding was "like a rhino without a horn" and was suspending people for no reason. That's why he was hiding.

questions.text: Ep. 8: Who agreed to babysit for Mr. Belding?
questions.explanation:
Scott and Weasel.

	While they were in Mr. Belding's office, the pair heard that he needed a babysitter and was upset because of it. Mr. Belding's son was named after Zach Morris from the original series of the show. Vicki, Lindsay and Megan all turned down helping babysit, leaving just Scott and Weasel. They took him to movies where the rest of the normal crew was anyway.

questions.text: Ep. 8: Scott claimed to be Mr. Belding's son.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He met a girl in the lobby of the movie theater who went to a different school. She didn't know who Mr. Belding was, and thought that Scott was his older brother. So he told her he was Scott Belding and went with it.

questions.text: Ep. 8: Who dressed up as Zack's grandfather?
questions.explanation:
Weasel.

	Scott and Tommy went to get Zack from Mr. Belding while Weasel, Linday, Vicki, and Megan went to the photography studio to stall since the baby wasn't available.

questions.text: Ep. 8: Did Mr. Belding agree to the photo shoot?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Belding agreed to let Zack be used in a photo shoot for a baby commercial. He told the kids that he was plenty mad, but would deal with them later. First his son had a date with stardom.

questions.text: Ep. 9: What event was going on at Bayside in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Career Week.

	Weasel was excited to get bubblegum flavored dental floss. Vicki and Lindsay were checking out the medical field and many other students were checking out the other booths.

questions.text: Ep. 9: What did Megan's dad do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Judge.

	Judge Jones was asked to fill in as the speaker at career week after the police chief had to cancel. The chief had gotten bitten by "McGruff" the crime the dog.

questions.text: Ep. 9: Milton and Kirby quit their jobs doing what?
questions.explanation:
Assistant principals.

	Tommy and Scott took over their jobs. They didn't get to hand out tardy slips or hall passes though. Instead they were made to polich trophies and other menial tasks. They were selected during career week to be Mr. Belding's assistants, but quit after Tommy threatened them.

questions.text: Ep. 9: Where was Megan's party held?
questions.explanation:
The Maxx.

	During the party the restaurant dedicated a new sandwich to her, a mega meatball sub. During the party they all pretended to be happy for her, but ended up telling her they didn't want her to leave.

No.

	She was accepted to Willowbrook Academy, the best school in California. She was excited to go, but her friends were sorry to see her leave. Mr. Belding told her that Bayside would miss her. She ended up deciding not to transfer.
